Title: Relates to services and expenses relating to investigations and hearings
Summary: Relates to services and expenses relating to investigations and hearings related to proceedings pursuant to article six of section twenty-four of the New York state constitution, and articles seven-c and thirteen-a of the judiciary law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 50 of the laws of 2021, enacting the state operations budget, in relation to services and expenses relating to investigations and hearings
